name: Second Helmet
description: It's a different helmet!

name: Simple Pistol
description: This simple revolver trades accuracy for flexibility.

name: Assault Rifle
description: The fastest way to fill a target with holes.

name: Rocket Launcher
description: Mankind's ultimate portable killing device.

name: Simple Bullet
description: A simple bullet, primarily used in forged handguns.

name: Bow
description: Masters of the bow often became great conquerers.  Requires arrows to fire.

name: Grenade
description: Pulling the pin starts a 5 second timer to an explosion.  Make sure you've thrown it by then.

name: Wood
description: A thick, sturdy cutting from a tree.

name: Stone
description: A hefty chunk of stone.

name: Metal
description: A lump of unrefined metal ore, mined from rocks usually found high on mountains, or in caves. Can be refined in a Forge.

name: Hide
description: A thick piece of skin, hacked from a dead animal.

name: Chitin
description: This firm, flexible material makes up exoskeletons. Hacked primarily from dead insects.

name: Raw Meat
description: Eating raw food will sate hunger, but is unhealthy for humans.  Most wild carnivores prefer raw meat to cooked meat.

name: Spoiled Meat
description:
Eww... do not eat.
This must have a use, right?

name: Cooked Meat
description: Sates your hunger, and provides health while being digested.  Wild carnivores will eat it, but prefer raw meat.

name: Water Jar
description: Safely carries a lot of water, but is also a bit heavy.

name: Water Jar
description: Safely carries a lot of water, but is also a bit heavy.

name: Cloth Pants
description: Provides some protection from the heat and cold, but only minimal protection from injuries.

name: Cloth Shirt
description: Provides some protection from the heat and cold, but only minimal protection from injuries.

name: Cloth Hat
description: Provides some protection from the heat and cold, but only minimal protection from injuries.

name: Cloth Boots
description: Hide-soled shoes provide some protection from the heat and cold, but only minimal protection from injuries.

name: Cloth Gloves
description: Hide-padded gloves provide some protection from the heat and cold, but only minimal protection from injuries.

name: Hide Pants
description: Keeps you warm while providing some physical protection.

name: Hide Shirt
description: Keeps you warm while providing some physical protection.

name: Hide Hat
description: Keeps you warm while providing some physical protection.

name: Hide Boots
description: Keeps you warm while providing some physical protection.

name: Hide Gloves
description: Keeps you warm while providing some physical protection.

name: Chitin Leggings
description: Provides moderate physical protection, but can get a little warm.

name: Chitin Chestpiece
description: Provides moderate physical protection, but can get a little warm.

name: Chitin Helmet
description: Provides moderate physical protection, but can get a little warm.

name: Chitin Boots
description: Provides moderate physical protection, but can get a little warm.

name: Chitin Gauntlets
description: Provides moderate physical protection, but can get a little warm.

name: Stone Arrow
description: A basic arrow with a flint arrowhead.  If it doesn't break, you can recover your ammo.

name: Stone Pick
description: A large stone pick for harvesting primarily flint from rocks, thatch from trees, and meat from bodies.

name: Stone Hatchet
description: A sharp flint hatchet for harvesting wood from trees, stone from rocks, and skin from bodies.

name: Metal Pick
description: A large metal pick for harvesting primarily flint from rocks, thatch from trees, and meat from bodies.

name: Metal Hatchet
description: A sharp metal hatchet for harvesting wood from trees, stone from rocks, and skin from bodies.

name: Torch
description: Provides light, and some warmth. Doubles as a melee weapon in a pinch, and can be applied to various saddles for a mobile light source.

name: Paintbrush
description: Apply a dye to this, then swing it at structures to paint them.

name: Campfire
description: Perfect for cooking meat, staying warm, and providing light.

name: Standing Torch
description: A torch on a tall piece of wood that lights and warms the immediate area.

name: Hide Sleeping Bag
description: This hide sleeping bag acts as a single-use respawn point, only usable by you.

name: C4 Remote Detonator
description: This device uses radio waves to detonate all primed C4 packages on the same frequency.

name: C4 Charge
description: This advanced explosive can annihilate structures.

name: Blood Extraction Syringe
description: Use this on a human to extract their blood for transfusion.

name: Blood Pack
description: Use this to replace lost blood.  Restores Health over time.

name: Improvised Explosive Device
description: Place two of these near each other to create an explosive trap.

name: Waterskin
description: Good to keep you hydrated, but slowly leaks water.

name: Waterskin
description: Good to keep you hydrated, but slowly leaks water.

name: Berrybush Seeds
description: Eat it to gain small nourishment, or plant it to grow your own Berrybush! (Supports Small, Medium, or Large Crop Plots)

name: Fertilizer
description: High nitrogen fertilizer that helps crops grow in their plots.

name: Bingleberry Soup
description: Eat it to mega nourishment, long-term fortification!

name: Medical Brew
description: This brew doesn't have any nutritional value, but it promotes healing.

name: Energy Brew
description: This brew doesn't have any nutritional value, but fills your stamina.

name: Small Animal Feces
description:
Everyone poops.
Can provide nitrogen to help crops grow in their plots.  Would be more efficient fertilizer if combined with thatch in a bin.

name: Human Feces
description:
Everyone poops.
Can provide nitrogen to help crops grow in their plots.  Would be more efficient fertilizer if combined with thatch in a bin.

name: Stego Egg
description: Eat it to gain tremendous nourishment, or use it in recipies, or...

name: Spear
description: A easily made melee weapon that can also be thrown.  Has a chance to break when used.

name: Red Coloring
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Green Coloring
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Blue Coloring
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Yellow Coloring
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Purple Coloring
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Orange Coloring
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Black Coloring
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: White Coloring
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Brown Coloring
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Cyan Coloring
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Purple Coloring
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Rex Saddle
description: Equip a Rex with this to ride it.

name: Tranq Arrow
description: Less deadly than other arrows, but rapidly increases the victim's Torpidity.

name: GPS
description: Detects strange energy from the three Obelisks to triangulate your exact location on the island.

name: Flint
description: Ferroceric flint that holds an edge better than regular stone.

name: Metal Ingot
description: Created by refining metal ore in a Forge.

name: Thatch
description: Sticks torn from trees.  Useful for primitive bindings.

name: Fiber
description: Delicately collected strands of plant.  Perfect for making thread, cloth, or rope.

name: Charcoal
description: Created by burning wood.

name: Crystal
description: This strange crystalline material can be shaped into lenses, used as an electronics component, or mixed into powerful explosives.

name: Thatch Ceiling
description: A thatched ceiling to protect you from the elements.  Not stable enough to build on.

name: Thatch Door
description: Enough sticks budled together work as a simple door.  Can be locked for security, but is not very strong.

name: Thatch Foundation
description: A foundation is required to build structures.  This one is a wooden frame with some smooth bundles of sticks that act as a floor.

name: Thatch Wall
description: A simple wall made of bundled sticks, and stablized by a wooden frame.  Fairly fragile, but better than nothing.

name: Thatch Doorframe
description: This thatch wall has an entrance in it, but requires more wood to stay stable.

name: Wooden Catwalk
description: A thin walkway for bridging areas together.  Made from sturdy wood.

name: Wooden Ceiling
description: A stable wooden ceiling that insulates the inside from the outside, and doubles as a floor for higher levels.

name: Wooden Hatchframe
description: This wooden ceiling has a hole in it for trapdoors.

name: Wooden Door
description: A stable wooden door that provides entance to structures. Can be locked for security.

name: Wooden Foundation
description: A foundation is required to build structures in an area.  This one is made from sturdy wood.

name: Wooden Ladder
description: A simple wooden ladder used to climb up or down tall structures.  Can also be used to extend existing ladders.

name: Wooden Pillar
description: Adds structural integrity to the area it is build on.  Can also act as stilts for buildings on inclines.

name: Wooden Ramp
description: An inclined wooden floor for travelling up or down levels.  Can also be used to make an angled roof.

name: Wooden Trapdoor
description: This small wooden door can be used to secure hatches.

name: Wooden Wall
description: A sturdy wooden wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity.

name: Wooden Doorframe
description: A wooden wall that provides entrance to a structure.

name: Wooden Windowframe
description: A wooden wall with a hole for a window.

name: Wooden Window
description: Wooden beams on hinges that cover windows to provide protection from projectiles and spying.

name: Wooden Sign
description: A simple wooden sign for landmark navigation or relaying messages.

name: Note
description: Write your own text in a note! Or put it in a Cooking Pot to make a Custom Recipe!

name: Citronal
description: This citrus fruit grows naturally along the coast.  It will probably prevent scurvy.

name: Parasaur Saddle
description: Equip a Parasaur with this to ride it.

name: Raptor Saddle
description: Equip a Raptor with this to ride it.

name: Stego Saddle
description: Equip a Stego with this to ride it.

name: Trike Saddle
description: Equip a Trike with this to ride it.

name: Pulmonoscorpius Saddle
description: Equip a Pulmonoscorpius with this to ride it.

name: Storage Box
description: A small box to store goods in.

name: Large Storage Box
description: A large cabinet to store goods in.

name: Mortar and Pestle
description: This simple stone contraption can be used to grind resources into new substances.

name: Sparkpowder
description: Created by grinding flint with stone in a Mortar and Pestle or Chemistry Table.

name: Gunpowder
description: An powerful propellant. Necessary for any firearm or explosive.

name: Stone Irrigation Pipe - Intake
description: The stone intake for an irrigation network that transports water over land.

name: Stone Irrigation Pipe - Straight
description: A straight stone pipe for an irrigation network, used for transporting water across land.

name: Stone Irrigation Pipe - Inclined
description: An inclined stone pipe for an irrigation network, used for transporting water up and down hills.

name: Stone Irrigation Pipe - Intersection
description: A plus-shaped stone intersection for an irrigation network, used for splitting one water source into three.

name: Stone Irrigation Pipe - Vertical
description: An vertical stone pipe for an irrigation network, used for transporting water up and down cliffs.

name: Stone Irrigation Pipe - Tap
description: This stone tap allows access to the water in an irrigation network.  Can refill containers, irrigate crop plots, or provide a refreshing drink.

name: Amarberry Seed
description: Eat it to gain a tiny amount of nourishment, or plant it to grow your own Amarberry bush.  Can be planted in Small, Medium, or Large Crop Plots.

name: Amarberry
description: This yellow berry grows mostly on the beaches.  Tasty, and can be used to make yellow dye.

name: Azulberry
description: This blue berry grows mostly in dense jungles.  Tasty, and can be used to make blue dye.

name: Tintoberry
description: This red berry grows mostly in wide open grasslands.  Tasty, and can be used to make red dye.

name: Mejoberry
description: This wild berry grows mostly on mountains.  While not tasty on its own, its juices improve almost every meal.

name: Narcoberry
description: This fairly common black berry makes you sleepy when you eat it.  Bitter, but can be used to make black dye.

name: Stimberry
description: This fairly common white berry can be eaten in a pinch to recover Food, Stamina, and lose Torpidity, but it will dehydrate you.  Bitter, but can be used to make white dye.

name: Narcotic
description: Increases your health, but puts you to sleep.

name: Stimulant
description: Keeps you awake, but dehydrates you.

name: Refining Forge
description: Requires Wood, Thatch, or Sparkpowder to activate.  Put unrefined resources in this to refine them.

name: Smithy
description: Place materials along with blueprints in this to create certain advanced forged items.

name: Compost Bin
description: A large bin for converting thatch and dung into high-quality fertilizer.

name: Cooking Pot
description: Must contain basic fuel to light the fire.  Put various ingredients with water in this to make soups, stews, and dyes.

name: Simple Bed
description: Thatch may not make the most comfortable mattress, but this bed acts as a respawn point for you and your tribe.

name: Small Crop Plot
description: A small garden plot, with a fence to keep out vermin.

name: Pteranodon Saddle
description: Equip a Pteranodon with this to ride it.

name: Longneck Rifle
description: This simple single-shot rifle is highly accurate, but has a long reload time.

name: Citronal Seed
description: Eat it to gain a tiny amount of nourishment, or plant it to grow your own Citronal crop.  Can be planted in Medium or Large Crop Plots.

name: Bronto Saddle
description: Equip a Bronto with this to ride it.

name: Wooden Fence Foundation
description: This very cheap, narrow foundation is used to build fences around an area.

name: Compass
description: Use this to find which direction you are travelling.

name: Scope Attachment
description:
The carefully shaped crystal lenses in this scope grant the user a telescopic aim when firing. Attach this to a supporting weapon to gain more accurate aiming.
<RichColor Color="0,1,1,1">Supports:  Pistols, Machined Shotgun, Machined Sniper and Longneck Rifle.</>

name: Slingshot
description: A simple ranged weapon that deals damage from afar.  Better for knocking out a target than killing it outright.  Requires stone to fire.

name: Pike
description: A powerful melee weapon tipped with metal.  Unlike the Spear, it cannot be thrown.

name: Radio
description: Use this to communicate securely over great distances.

name: Obsidian
description: A very rare resource, found underground.  Can be broken down and used to make modern tech.

name: Dinosaur Gateway
description: A large wood and stone gateway that can be used with a Gate to keep most dinosaurs in or out.

name: Simple Rifle Ammo
description: An odd bullet and casing, used with forged rifles.

name: Cementing Paste
description: This thick, waterproof paste could be used as mortar, or to thicken another substance.

name: Dinosaur Gate
description: A large wooden gate that can be used with a Gateway to keep dinosaurs in or out.

name: Artifact of the Hunter
description:
With relentless determination, the hunter will never waiver until it catches its prey.
<RichColor Color="1,0,0,1">Only one of these may be carried at a time by an organism.</>

name: Artifact of the Pack
description:
Stronger than any lone creature, one may die but the pack will survive.
<RichColor Color="1,0,0,1">Only one of these may be carried at a time by an organism.</>

name: Artifact of the Massive
description:
Size alone can sometimes mean the difference between survival and oblivion.
<RichColor Color="1,0,0,1">Only one of these may be carried at a time by an organism.</>

name: Artifact of the Devious
description:
With craft and cunning, to look out for one's self may be essential to survival.
<RichColor Color="1,0,0,1">Only one of these may be carried at a time by an organism.</>

name: Artifact of the Clever
description:
Wit and and quick thinking may turn the odds in one's favor, even when nature has other plans.
<RichColor Color="1,0,0,1">Only one of these may be carried at a time by an organism.</>

name: Artifact of the Skylord
description:
Mastery of the skies confers a distinct advantage over earthbound competition.
<RichColor Color="1,0,0,1">Only one of these may be carried at a time by an organism.</>

name: Artifact of the Devourer
description:
To consume is to become, and to become is to evolve.
<RichColor Color="1,0,0,1">Only one of these may be carried at a time by an organism.</>

name: Artifact of the Immune
description:
With a mastery of one's equilibrium, no simple poison nor toxin can be a threat.
<RichColor Color="1,0,0,1">Only one of these may be carried at a time by an organism.</>

name: Artifact of the Strong
description:
Such power may be crucial when survival becomes a question of raw physical capability.
<RichColor Color="1,0,0,1">Only one of these may be carried at a time by an organism.</>

name: Argentavis Talon
description: This trophy proves your worth as a hunter.

name: Megalodon Tooth
description: This trophy proves your worth as a hunter.

name: Tyrannosaurus Arm
description: This trophy proves your worth as a hunter.

name: Sauropod Vertebra
description: This trophy proves your worth as a hunter.

name: Oil
description: A thick blob of unrefined oil.  Can be refined with hide to make gasoline.

name: Silica Pearls
description: These pearls are made almost entirely of Silicon.  Can be refined into Silicon plates.

name: Gasoline
description: An advanced fuel. Can only be used in machines designed to consume it.

name: Electronics
description: This multipurpose computer chip can be used to create electronic devices.

name: Polymer
description: These incredibly strong, lightweight plates can be shaped and then heat treated into casings for anything.

name: Metal Catwalk
description: A thin walkway for bridging areas together.  Made from metal plates.

name: Metal Ceiling
description: A stable metal-plated concrete ceiling that provides insulation, and doubles as a floor for higher levels.

name: Metal Hatchframe
description: This metal-plated concrete ceiling has a hole in it for trapdoors.

name: Metal Door
description: A stable metal-plated concrete door that provides entance to structures. Can be locked for security.

name: Metal Fence Foundation
description: This very strong, narrow foundation is used to build walls around an area.

name: Metal Foundation
description: A foundation is required to build structures in an area.  This one is made from sturdy metal-plated concrete.

name: Behemoth Gate
description: A large metal-plated concrete gate that can be used with a Behemoth Gateway to allow even the largest creatures in or out.

name: Behemoth Gateway
description: A large metal-plated concrete gateway, reinforced with obsidian polymer, that can be used with a Behemoth Gate to allow even the largest creatures in or out.

name: Metal Ladder
description: A simple metal ladder used to climb up or down tall structures.  Can also be used to extend existing ladders.

name: Metal Pillar
description: This metal-plated concrete pillar adds structural integrity to the area it is build under.  Can also act as stilts for buildings on inclines.

name: Metal Ramp
description: An inclined metal-plated concrete floor for travelling up or down levels.  Can also be used to make an angled roof.

name: Metal Trapdoor
description: This metal-plated concrete slab can be used to secure hatches.

name: Metal Wall
description: A metal-plated concrete wall that insulates the inside from the outside and separates rooms.

name: Metal Doorframe
description: A metal-plated concrete wall that provides entrance to a structure.

name: Metal Windowframe
description: A metal-plated concrete wall, with a hole for a window.

name: Metal Window
description: Metal plates on hinges that cover windows to provide protection from projectiles and spying.

name: Super Test Meat
description: You shouldn't have this.  Seriously.  It's not possible to obtain.  There's either a huge bug you need to report, or you're cheating.

name: Flare Gun
description: A single-use flare launcher. Fires a bright ball of Sparkpowder to temporarily light an area.

name: Fabricator
description: Place materials along with blueprints in this to create certain high-end machined items.

name: Water Reservoir
description: Attach this to pipes to store rain, irrigation, or manually deposited water for later use. Will automatically irrigate nearby crops if attached to a tap.

name: Parachute
description: Use this while falling to slow your fall. Jump while parachuting to deactivate it.

name: Air Conditioner
description: Requires electricity to run.  Provides insulation from both the heat and the cold to an area.

name: Electrical Generator
description: A large machine that converts gasoline into electricity.

name: Electrical Outlet
description: An outlet for an electrical grid.  When connected to a generator via cables, this provides power to all nearby devices that use electricity.

name: Inclined Electrical Cable
description: An inclined cable for transmitting electricity up and down hills.

name: Electrical Cable Intersection
description: A plus-shaped intersection for a power grid, used for splitting one power cable into three.

name: Straight Electrical Cable
description: A straight cable, used for transmitting electricity across land.

name: Vertical Electrical Cable
description: An vertical cable for transmitting electricity up and down cliffs.

name: Lamppost
description: Requires electricity to activate. Lights an area without adding much heat.

name: Refrigerator
description: Requires electricity to run.  Keeps perishables from spoiling for a long time.

name: Auto Turret
description: Requires electricity to run.  Consumes bullets while firing.  Can be configured to automatically attack hostiles within range.

name: Remote Keypad
description: Allows remote access to multiple doors and/or lights.

name: Metal Irrigation Pipe - Inclined
description: An inclined metal pipe for an irrigation network, used for transporting water up and down hills.

name: Metal Irrigation Pipe - Intake
description: The metal intake for an irrigation network that transports water over land.

name: Metal Irrigation Pipe - Intersection
description: A plus-shaped metal intersection for an irrigation network, used for splitting one water source into three.

name: Metal Irrigation Pipe - Straight
description: A straight metal pipe for an irrigation network, used for transporting water across land.

name: Metal Irrigation Pipe - Tap
description: This metal tap allows access to the water in an irrigation network.  Can refill containers, irrigate crop plots, or provide a refreshing drink.

name: Metal Irrigation Pipe - Vertical
description: An vertical metal pipe for an irrigation network, used for transporting water up and down cliffs.

name: Flashlight Attachment
description:
This flashlight sheds light out in a wide area, but makes you easier to see too.
Attach this to a supporting weapon to shine light from a weapon.
<RichColor Color="0,1,1,1">Supports: Sniper Rifle, Pistols, Longneck Rifle, Shotguns, and Assault Rifle.</>

name: Silencer Attachment
description:
The lubricated materials in this silencer slow the gases released from a gunshot, muffling the sounds.
Attach this to a supporting weapon for reduced noise when firing.
<RichColor Color="0,1,1,1">Supports:  Longneck Rifle, Pistols, Assault Rifle.</>

name: Carbonemys Saddle
description: Equip a Carbonemys with this to ride it.

name: Sarco Saddle
description: Equip a Sarco with this to ride it.

name: Ankylo Saddle
description: Equip a Ankylo with this to ride it.

name: Mammoth Saddle
description: Equip a Mammoth with this to ride it.

name: Megalodon Saddle
description: Equip a Megalodon with this to ride it.

name: Sabertooth Saddle
description: Equip a Sabertooth with this to ride it.

name: Carno Saddle
description: Equip a Carno with this to ride it.

name: Argentavis Saddle
description: Equip a Argentavis with this to ride it.

name: Chitin/Keratin
description: A firm, flexible material. Primarily found on creatures with hard organic materials.

name: Keratin
description: A firm, flexible material. Can be found in some animal horns, plates, shells, and ridges.

name: Metal Sign
description: A small metal sign for landmark navigation or relaying messages.

name: Holo-Scope Attachment
description:
This advanced scope can tell friends from strangers.
Attach this to a supporting weapon to gain more accurate aiming.
<RichColor Color="0,1,1,1">Supports: Machine Pistol, Assault Rifle, and Machined Shotgun.</>

name: Laser Attachment
description:
This advanced aiming device places a red dot where the weapon is pointed.
Attach this to a supporting weapon to add a laser sight.
<RichColor Color="0,1,1,1">Supports:  Pistols, Assault Rifle, Shotguns, Longneck Rifle, Sniper Rifle.</>

name: Wooden Billboard
description: A large wooden billboard for landmark navigation or relaying messages.

name: Flak Leggings
description: Provides heavy physical protection, but makes the elements harder to endure.

name: Flak Chestpiece
description: Provides heavy physical protection, but makes the elements harder to endure.

name: Flak Helmet
description: Provides heavy physical protection, but makes the elements harder to endure.

name: Flak Boots
description: Provides heavy physical protection, but makes the elements harder to endure.

name: Flak Gauntlets
description: Provides heavy physical protection, but makes the elements harder to endure.

name: Enduro Stew
description: This hearty dish is like a workout in the form of a meal.  Consume it to deal increased melee damage, and gain extra stamina regen.  Effects last 15 minutes.

name: Lazarus Chowder
description: This creamy dish improves the body's natural constitution.  Consume it to slow your rate of oxygen consumption while underwater, and gain extra health regen.  Effects last 15 minutes.

name: Calien Soup
description: This simple vegetarian dish refreshes your body like an oasis.  Consume it to gain increased hyperthermic insulation, and slow your rate of water consumption.  Effects last 15 minutes.

name: Fria Curry
description: This spicy vegetarian dish fills the body with a comfortable warmth.  Consume it to gain increased hypothermic insulation, and slow your rate of food consumption.  Effects last 15 minutes.

name: Focal Chili
description: This filling dish is full of nutritional energy.  Consume it to gain increased craft speed, and gain increased movement speed.  Effects last 15 minutes.

name: Savoroot
description: This starchy tuber grows naturally in densely wooded areas.  It is very hearty, but tastes better when cooked.

name: Longrass
description: This grain plant grows best in open, fertile areas.  It can be eaten by the cob, but more clever chefs will think of other options.

name: Rockarrot
description: This root vegetable seems to thrive near mammals, and not dinosaurs.  As such, it can be found mostly in the mountains.

name: Azulberry Seed
description: Eat it to gain a tiny amount of nourishment, or plant it to grow your own Azulberry bush.  Can be planted in Small, Medium, or Large Crop Plots.

name: Tintoberry Seed
description: Eat it to gain a tiny amount of nourishment, or plant it to grow your own Tintoberry bush.  Can be planted in Small, Medium, or Large Crop Plots.

name: Mejoberry Seed
description: Eat it to gain a tiny amount of nourishment, or plant it to grow your own Mejoberry bush.  Can be planted in Small, Medium, or Large Crop Plots.

name: Narcoberry Seed
description: Eat it to gain a tiny amount of nourishment, or plant it to grow your own Narcoberry bush.  Can be planted in Small, Medium, or Large Crop Plots.

name: Stimberry Seed
description: Eat it to gain a tiny amount of nourishment, or plant it to grow your own Stimberry bush.  Can be planted in Small, Medium, or Large Crop Plots.

name: Savoroot Seed
description: Eat it to gain a tiny amount of nourishment, or plant it to grow your own Savoroot crop.  Can be planted in Medium or Large Crop Plots.

name: Longrass Seed
description: Eat it to gain a tiny amount of nourishment, or plant it to grow your own Longrass crop.  Can be planted in Medium or Large Crop Plots.

name: Rockarrot Seed
description: Eat it to gain a tiny amount of nourishment, or plant it to grow your own Rockarrot crop.  Can be planted in Medium or Large Crop Plots.

name: Metal Billboard
description: A large metal billboard for landmark navigation or relaying messages.

name: Fabricated Pistol
description: This advanced pistol gains a high rate of fire and a large magazine size by sacrificing stopping power.

name: Advanced Bullet
description: A small-caliber modern bullet, primarily used with fabricated handguns.

name: Advanced Rifle Bullet
description: A medium-caliber modern bullet, primarily used with fabricated rifles.

name: Rocket Propelled Grenade
description: A small but powerful explosive, primarily used with rocket launchers.

name: Medium Crop Plot
description: A medium garden plot, with a fence to keep out vermin.

name: Large Crop Plot
description: A large garden plot, with a fence to keep out vermin.

name: Rare Flower
description: Even the smell of this flower makes you slightly angry.

name: Rare Mushroom
description: You feel lightheaded after just touching this.  Ingesting it would be dangerous.

name: Raw Prime Meat
description:
Eating raw food will sate hunger, but is unhealthy for humans.  This excellent cut spoils very quickly.
Most wild carnivores love this meat.

name: Cooked Prime Meat
description:
Sates your hunger, and provides health while being digested.  More effective than normal meat.
Wild carnivores like this meat a lot.

name: Battle Tartare
description: This dish grants you almost combat prowess of a berserker.  Consume it to gain massively increased melee damage, move speed, damage resistance, and stamina regen.  Also causes you to consume food and water more quickly, and lose health.  Effects last 3 minutes.

name: Shadow Steak Saute
description: This dish grants you clarity of the night.  Consume it to see more light, ignore most weather, and steady your aim.  Can be dangerous to use in daylight.  Effects last 3 minutes.

name: Rockwell Recipes: Enduro Stew
description:
This hearty dish is like a workout in the form of a meal.  You will find yourself hitting harder and running longer after eating this.

3 servings of cooked meat
5 Rockarrot
5 Savoroot
1 handful of Mejoberries
1/2 dollop of Stimulant
Submerge in Water
Cook in a Cooking Pot

name: Rockwell Recipes: Lazarus Chowder
description:
This creamy dish improves the body's natural constitution.  You will recover from injury more quickly after eating this, and your body will need less oxygen.

3 servings of cooked meat
5 Savoroot
5 Longrass
1 handful of Mejoberries
1/2 dollop of Narcotic
Submerge in Water
Cook in a Cooking Pot

name: Rockwell Recipes: Calien Soup
description:
This simple vegetarian dish refreshes your body like an oasis.  Helps keep you stay hydrated and feel cool.

5 Citronal
2 handfuls of Tintoberries
2 handfuls of Amarberries
1 handful of Mejoberries
1/2 dollop of Stimulant
Submerge in Water
Cook in a Cooking Pot

name: Rockwell Recipes: Fria Curry
description:
This spicy vegetarian dish fills the body with a comfortable warmth.  It controls your apetite while helping you ignore the cold.

5 Longrass
5 Rockarrot
2 handfuls of Azulberries
1 handful of Mejoberries
1/2 dollop of Narcotic
Submerge in Water
Cook in a Cooking Pot

name: Rockwell Recipes: Focal Chili
description:
This filling dish is full of nutritional energy.  You will notice your mind more focussed after eating this, allowing you to avoid obstacles and distractions.

3 servings of cooked meat
5 Citronal
2 handfuls of Amarberries
2 handfuls of Azulberries
2 handfuls of Tintoberries
1 handful of Mejoberries
Submerge in Water
Cook in a Cooking Pot

name: Rockwell Recipes: Battle Tartare
description:
Only eat this dish when you intend to go into a brawl.  It causes pain and stress to your body, but grants you almost supernatural strength, speed, and resilience.
Warning: this concoction can be habit-forming.

1 serving of Raw Prime Meat
2 handful of Mejoberries
2 dollops of Stimulant
2 Rare Flowers
1 Citronal
1 Longrass
Submerge in Water
Cook in a Cooking Pot

name: Rockwell Recipes: Shadow Steak Saute
description:
Only eat this dish in the dark.  It causes the light receptors in your eyes to become hyperactive, improves your hand-eye coordination, and allows your body to ignore extreme temperatures.
Warning: this concoction can be habit-forming.

1 serving of Cooked Prime Meat
2 handful of Mejoberries
2 dollops of Narcotic
2 Rare Mushrooms
1 Savoroot
1 Rockarrot
Submerge in Water
Cook in a Cooking Pot

name: Notes on Rockwell Recipes
description:
I'm pretty sure I've figured out the measuring system used in those Rockwell Recipe sheets I've seen people packing away.

Serving of meat: 3 meat
Handful of berries: 10 berries
Dollop of medicine: 4 medicine
Water: Any container of water that is more than 25% full

name: Wooden Wall Sign
description: A simple wooden wall sign for basic messages, requires attaching to a wall.

name: Metal Dinosaur Gateway
description: A large metal gateway that can be used with a Gate to keep most dinosaurs in or out.

name: Metal Dinosaur Gate
description: A large metal gate that can be used with a Gateway to most keep dinosaurs in or out.

name: Shotgun
description: Very powerful up close, but less reliable with range.

name: Simple Shotgun Ammo
description: A few simple bullets in a hide casing, used with forged shotguns.

name: Metal Wall Sign
description: A simple metal wall sign for basic messages, requires attaching to a wall.

name: Amarberry Seed
description: Eat it to gain a tiny amount of nourishment, or plant it to grow your own Amarberry bush.  Can be planted in Small, Medium, or Large Crop Plots.

name: Azulberry Seed
description: Eat it to gain a tiny amount of nourishment, or plant it to grow your own Azulberry bush.  Can be planted in Small, Medium, or Large Crop Plots.

name: Tintoberry Seed
description: Eat it to gain a tiny amount of nourishment, or plant it to grow your own Tintoberry bush.  Can be planted in Small, Medium, or Large Crop Plots.

name: Narcoberry Seed
description: Eat it to gain a tiny amount of nourishment, or plant it to grow your own Narcoberry bush.  Can be planted in Small, Medium, or Large Crop Plots.

name: Stimberry Seed
description: Eat it to gain a tiny amount of nourishment, or plant it to grow your own Stimberry bush.  Can be planted in Small, Medium, or Large Crop Plots.

name: Mejoberry Seed
description: Eat it to gain a tiny amount of nourishment, or plant it to grow your own Mejoberry bush.  Can be planted in Small, Medium, or Large Crop Plots.

name: Citronal Seed
description: Eat it to gain a tiny amount of nourishment, or plant it to grow your own Citronal crop.  Can be planted in Medium or Large Crop Plots.

name: Savoroot Seed
description: Eat it to gain a tiny amount of nourishment, or plant it to grow your own Savoroot crop.  Can be planted in Medium or Large Crop Plots.

name: Longrass Seed
description: Eat it to gain a tiny amount of nourishment, or plant it to grow your own Longrass crop.  Can be planted in Medium or Large Crop Plots.

name: Rockarrot Seed
description: Eat it to gain a tiny amount of nourishment, or plant it to grow your own Rockarrot crop.  Can be planted in Medium or Large Crop Plots.

name: Multi-Panel Flag
description: Mark your tribe's territory and show off your colors by placing this and dying it.

name: Hunter Hat
description: You can use this to skin the appearance of a helmet or hat. Provides an adventurous look.

name: Rex Stomped Glasses Saddle Skin
description: Welcome to ARK! Equip a Tyrannosaurus with this to live the high life.

name: Spyglass
description: This instrument, while primitive, is quite effective at long-range reconnaissance.

name: Spider Flag
description: This flag is proof that you have defeated the Broodmother.

name: Phiomia Saddle
description: Equip a Phiomia with this to ride it.

name: Medium Animal Feces
description:
Everyone poops.
Can provide nitrogen to help crops grow in their plots.  Would be more efficient fertilizer if combined with thatch in a bin.

name: Large Animal Feces
description:
Everyone poops.
Can provide nitrogen to help crops grow in their plots.  Would be more efficient fertilizer if combined with thatch in a bin.

name: Bronto Egg
description: Eat it to gain tremendous nourishment, or use it in recipies, or...

name: Parasaur Egg
description: Eat it to gain tremendous nourishment, or use it in recipies, or...

name: Raptor Egg
description: Eat it to gain tremendous nourishment, or use it in recipies, or...

name: Rex Egg
description: Eat it to gain tremendous nourishment, or use it in recipies, or...

name: Trike Egg
description: Eat it to gain tremendous nourishment, or use it in recipies, or...

name: Parasaur Stylish Saddle
description: Use this on a Parasaurolophus saddle to ride in posh style.

name: Dodo Egg
description: Eat it to gain tremendous nourishment, or use it in recipies, or...

name: Preserving Bin
description: Burns sparkpowder at low temperatures to dehydrate food and kill bacteria.  Keeps perishables from spoiling for a small time.

name: Metal Spike Wall
description: These incredibly sharp metal spikes are dangerous to any that touch them.  Larger creatures take more damage.

name: Cooked Meat Jerky
description:
Sates your hunger, and provides health while being digested.  Lasts longer than cooked meat.
Wild carnivores will eat it, but prefer raw meat.

name: Prime Meat Jerky
description:
Sates your hunger, and provides health while being digested.  More effective than normal meat jerky, and lasts longer than cooked prime meat.
Wild carnivores like this meat a lot.

name: Rex Bone Helmet
description: You can use this to skin the appearance of a helmet or hat. Provides a scary look!

name: Nerdry Glasses
description: You can use this to skin the appearance of a helmet or hat. Slightly cracked and chewed, but still provides an intelligent look!

name: Rockwell Recipes: Medical Brew
description:
This simple tonic immediately jump-starts your body's natural healing.

2 handful of Tintoberries
1/2 dollops of Narcotic
Submerge in Water
Cook in a Cooking Pot

name: Rockwell Recipes: Energy Brew
description:
This simple tonic quickly rejuvenates your body's natural energy stores.

2 handful of Azulberries
1/2 dollops of Stimulant
Submerge in Water
Cook in a Cooking Pot

name: Spino Saddle
description: Equip a Spino with this to ride it.

name: Rockwell Recipes: Meat Jerky
description:
While it might not taste as good as freshly cooked meat, jerky is just as nutritious and lasts much longer.

1/3 serving of meat (any quality)
1/4 dollop of Oil
Sprinkle with Sparkpowder (to dehydrate)
Cook in a Preserving Bin

name: Heavy Miner's Helmet
description: Provides heavy physical protection, but makes the elements harder to endure. Comes with a built-in light source, which wears out over time.

name: Vault
description: A large metal vault to securely store goods in.

name: Wooden Spike Wall
description: These incredibly sharp wooden stakes are dangerous to any that touch them.  Larger creatures take more damage.

name: Dino Glasses
description: You can use this to skin the appearance of a Saddle. Make your mount look distinguished and well-read with these impressive looking hand-made spectacles!

name: Bookshelf
description: A large bookshelf to store blueprints, notes, and other small trinkets in.

name: Stone Fence Foundation
description: This strong, narrow foundation is used to build walls around an area.

name: Stone Wall
description: A brick-and-mortar wall that insulates the inside from the outside and separates rooms.

name: Metal Water Reservoir
description: Attach this to pipes to store rain, irrigation, or manually deposited water for later use. Will automatically irrigate nearby crops if attached to a tap. Stores a large amount of water!

name: Plesiosaur Saddle
description: Equip a Plesiosaur with this to ride it.

name: Ichthyosaurus Saddle
description: Equip an Ichthyosaurus with this to ride it.

name: Stone Ceiling
description: A stable brick-and-mortar ceiling that insulates the inside from the outside, and doubles as a floor for higher levels.

name: Stone Hatchframe
description: This brick-and-mortar ceiling has a hole in it for trapdoors.

name: Reinforced Wooden Door
description: A reinforced wooden door that provides entrance to structures. Can be locked for security.

name: Stone Foundation
description: A foundation is required to build structures in an area.  This one is made from brick-and-mortar.

name: Reinforced Dinosaur Gate
description: A large, reinforced wooden gate that can be used with a Gateway to keep dinosaurs in or out.

name: Stone Dinosaur Gateway
description: A large brick-and-mortar gateway that can be used with a Gate to keep most dinosaurs in or out.

name: Stone Pillar
description: Adds structural integrity to the area it is build on.  Can also act as stilts for buildings on inclines.

name: Stone Doorframe
description: A brick-and-mortar wall that provides entrance to a structure.

name: Stone Windowframe
description: A brick-and-mortar wall with a hole for a window.

name: Fireworks Flaregun
description: Light up the sky with these independent fireworks!

name: Tripwire Narcotic Trap
description: Place two of these nearby each other to create a poisonous trap. However, its noxious effect renders creatures untameable that are directly knocked out by it.

name: Tripwire Alarm Trap
description: Place two of these near each other to create an alarm trap.

name: Kibble (Ankylo Egg)
description: This pet food recipe has been carefully designed to give balanced nutrition to almost any creature native to the island.  Includes the best protein, plant fibers to help with digestion, and egg to bind the mix.  Humans have difficulty digesting this.

name: Kibble (Argentavis Egg)
description: This pet food recipe has been carefully designed to give balanced nutrition to almost any creature native to the island.  Includes the best protein, plant fibers to help with digestion, and egg to bind the mix.  Humans have difficulty digesting this.

description: This pet food recipe has been carefully designed to give balanced nutrition to almost any creature native to the island.  Includes plant fibers to help with digestion and egg to bind the mix.  Humans have difficulty digesting this.

name: Ankylo Egg
description: Eat it to gain tremendous nourishment, or use it in recipies, or...

description: Eat it to gain tremendous nourishment, or use it in recipies, or...

description: Eat it to gain tremendous nourishment, or use it in recipies, or...

name: Spino Egg
description: Eat it to gain tremendous nourishment, or use it in recipies, or...

name: Turtle Egg
description: Eat it to gain tremendous nourishment, or use it in recipies, or...

name: Rockwell Recipes: Egg-based Kibble
description:
This recipe needs to be tweaked on a per-egg basis, but this will make a balanced pet food that can be eaten by any tamed creature.  A long cooking time removes excess water, which means this will last a long time on the shelf.  You will need to test the egg-meat-vegetable combinations.

1 egg
1 cooked-or-jerkied meat
1 vegetable
2 Mejoberries
3 Fiber (aids digestion)
Submerge in Water
Cook in a CookingPot

name: Reinforced Window
description: Reinforced window covering to provide protection from projectiles and spying.

name: Reinforced Trapdoor
description: This small reinforced door can be used to secure hatches.

name: Omnidirectional Lamppost
description: Requires electricity to activate. Lights a large area without adding much heat.

name: Industrial Grill
description: Perfect for cooking meat in bulk, staying warm, and providing light. Powered by gasoline.

name: Pump-Action Shotgun
description: Powerful up close, but less reliable with range.  Can fire multiple times before reloading.

name: Crossbow
description: Has signifantly more power than the Bow, but cannot fire rapidly.  Can fire underwater.

name: Forest Coloring
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Parchement Coloring
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Pink Coloring
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Royalty Coloring
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Silver Coloring
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Sky Coloring
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Tan Coloring
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Tangerine Coloring
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Rockwell Recipes: Decorative Coloring
description:
Not only is this berry-based coloring is great for decorating cakes, it also doubles as a dye for clothing and buildings.

18 Berries
Add 1-3 of a chemical catalyst
Submerge in Water
Cook in a Cooking Pot

To make different colors:
1 - Use different berries in varying amounts
2 - Use a different catalyst, such as Charcoal or Gunpowder

name: Transponder Tracker
description: Uses strange energy from the three Obelisks to triangulate all Transponder Nodes on the specified frequency.

name: Transponder Node
description: Can be attached to living creatures to track their location.

name: Single Panel Flag
description: Mark your tribe's territory and show off your its colors by placing this and painting it.

name: Feeding Trough
description: Put food for your nearby pets in this, and they'll automatically eat it when hungry!

name: Compound Bow
description: A high-tech bow made of durable alloy, can launch arrows at high velocity.  Requires arrows to fire.

name: Metal Arrow
description: An armor-and-hide piercing metal arrow.

name: Canteen
description: Safely carries a sizable amount of water, and is reasonably lightweight.

name: Canteen
description: Safely carries a sizable amount of water, and is reasonably lightweight.

name: Metal Sickle
description: A curved tool ideal for harvesting fiber from seed plants. Also useful for delicately shearing off slices of Prime Fish!

name: Behemoth Stone Dinosaur Gateway
description: A massive brick-and-mortar gateway that can be used for penning up huge dinosaurs.

name: Behemoth Reinforced Dinosaur Gate
description: A large, reinforced wooden gate that can be used with a Behemoth Gateway to keep dinosaurs in or out.

name: Bear Trap
description: Immobilizes humans and small creatures.

name: Large Bear Trap
description: Immobilizes large creatures only.

name: Trike Bone Helmet
description: You can use this to skin the appearance of a helmet or hat. Provides a noble look!

name: Re-Fertilizer
description: Spread these seeds of concentrated nutrients around and what was once harvested may yet regrow, even nearby a structure!

name: SCUBA Tank
description: A tank that's filled with Oxygen. Used to temporarliy breathe underwater.

name: SCUBA Mask
description: Connects to a SCUBA tank, allowing the wearer to breathe underwater for as long as the tank has Oxygen.

name: SCUBA Flippers
description: These flippers are firm, but flexible.  Wearing them increases swim speed, but decreases walking speed.

name: Plant Species X Seed
description: Plant this in a viable large crop plot to grow a frightening-looking defensive plant, which will shoot poisonous spores at any interlopers!

name: Plant Species X Seed
description: Plant this in a viable large crop plot to grow a frightening-looking defensive plant, which will shoot poisonous spores at any interlopers!

name: Spray Painter
description: Apply a dye to this, then shoot it at structures to paint them. Hold Alt Fire + Hotkey Number to set painting region.

name: Doedicurus Saddle
description: Equip a Doedicurus with this to ride it.

name: Sloped Thatch Roof
description: An inclined thatched roof. Slightly different angle than the ramp.

name: Sloped Thatch Wall Left
description: A simple thatched sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with a roof.

name: Sloped Thatch Wall Right
description: A simple thatched sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with a roof.

name: Sloped Wooden Roof
description: An inclined wooden roof. Slightly different angle than the ramp.

name: Sloped Wood Wall Left
description: A sturdy wooden sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

name: Sloped Wood Wall Right
description: A sturdy wooden sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

name: Sloped Stone Roof
description: An inclined stone roof. Slightly different angle than the ramp.

name: Sloped Stone Wall Left
description: A sturdy Stone sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

name: Sloped Stone Wall Right
description: A sturdy Stone sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

name: Sloped Metal Roof
description: An inclined Metal roof. Slightly different angle than the ramp.

name: Sloped Metal Wall Left
description: A sturdy Metal sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

name: Sloped Metal Wall Right
description: A sturdy Metal sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.

name: Magenta Coloring
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Brick Coloring
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Cantaloupe Coloring
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Mud Coloring
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Navy Coloring
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Olive Coloring
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Slate Coloring
description: This substance can be used to color certain items and structures.

name: Mindwipe Tonic
description: Drink this tonic to forget everything you have learned (resets your Engram Points). Can only be used once per newly-gained level.

name: Wooden Raft
description: A floating wooden platform that you can pilot across the water.  Can support the weight of structures and be built on.

name: Bronto Platform Saddle
description: Equip a Bronto with this to ride it.  You can build structures on the large platform to make a mobile base.

name: Pachy Saddle
description: Equip a Pachy with this to ride it.

name: Pachycephalosaurus Egg
description: Eat it to gain tremendous nourishment, or use it in recipies, or...

name: Kibble (Pachy Egg)
description: This pet food recipe has been carefully designed to give balanced nutrition to almost any creature native to the island.  Includes plant fibers to help with digestion and egg to bind the mix.  Humans have difficulty digesting this.

name: Rockwell Recipes: Mindwipe Tonic
description:
When consumed, this tonic causes neural overload.  Synapses fire off too quickly, resulting in damage to the memory centers of the brain related to construction.
Warning: this concoction may cause temporary memory loss, and resetting of Engrams.

8 serving of Cooked Prime Meat
20 handful of Mejoberries
18 dollops of Narcotic
18 dollops of Stimulant
20 Rare Mushrooms
20 Rare Flower
Submerge in Water
Cook in a Cooking Pot

name: Painting Canvas
description: A canvas sheet stretched over a wooden frame. Perfect for painting on.

name: Paracer Saddle
description: Equip a Paracer with this to ride it.

name: Paracer Platform Saddle
description: Equip a Paraceratherium with this to ride it. You can build structures on the large platform to make a mobile base.

name: Pelt
description: A thick piece of skin, densely covered with heavy insulating fur. Carefully hacked from a dead animal.

name: Dimorph Egg
description: Eat it to gain tremendous nourishment, or use it in recipies, or...

name: Kibble (Dimorph Egg)
description: This pet food recipe has been carefully designed to give balanced nutrition to almost any creature native to the island.  Includes plant fibers to help with digestion and egg to bind the mix.  Humans have difficulty digesting this.

name: Beelzebufo Saddle
description: Equip a Beelzebufo with this to ride it.

name: Megaloceros Saddle
description: Equip a Megaloceros with this to ride it.

name: Fur Leggings
description: Provides significant physical protection. Also keeps your temperature up, so long as it stays dry.

name: Fur Chestpiece
description: Provides significant physical protection. Also keeps your temperature up, so long as it stays dry.

name: Fur Cap
description: Provides significant physical protection. Also keeps your temperature up, so long as it stays dry.

name: Fur Boots
description: Provides significant physical protection. Also keeps your temperature up, so long as it stays dry.

name: Fur Gauntlets
description: Provides significant physical protection. Also keeps your temperature up, so long as it stays dry.

name: Wooden Club
description: A easily made melee weapon that is excellent for knocking out targets. Only effective at short range.

name: Poison Grenade
description: Releases narcotic smoke to knock out anything in the area -- only affects humans.

name: Fabricated Sniper Rifle
description: This semi-automatic rifle has less punch than a Longneck Rifle, but can be fired much more rapidly.

name: DodoRex Mask
description: You can use this to skin the appearance of a helmet or hat. Provides a hallowed look

name: Greenhouse Wall
description: A metal-framed, glass wall that insulates the inside from the outside and separates rooms.  Excellent for growing crops indoors.

name: Greenhouse Ceiling
description: A metal-framed, glass ceiling that provides insulation, and doubles as a floor for higher levels.  Excellent for growing crops indoors.

name: Greenhouse Doorframe
description: A metal-framed, glass wall that provides entrance to a structure.  Excellent for growing crops indoors.

name: Greenhouse Door
description: A metal-framed, glass door that provides entrance to structures. Can be locked for security.  Excellent for growing crops indoors.

name: Sloped Greenhouse Wall Left
description: A sturdy metal-framed, glass sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.  Excellent for growing crops indoors.

name: Sloped Greenhouse Wall Right
description: A sturdy metal-framed, glass sloped wall that insulates the inside from the outside, separates rooms, and provides structural integrity. Used in conjunction with the roof.  Excellent for growing crops indoors.

name: Sloped Greenhouse Roof
description: An inclined metal-framed, glass roof. Slightly different angle than the ramp.  Excellent for growing crops indoors.

name: Greenhouse Window
description: Metal-framed, glass plates on hinges that cover windows to provide protection from projectiles and spying.  Excellent for growing crops indoors.

name: Riot Leggings
description: Provides heavy physical protection and reduced physical torpor, but provides almost no protection from the elements.

name: Riot Chestpiece
description: Provides heavy physical protection and reduced physical torpor, but provides almost no protection from the elements.

name: Riot Gauntlets
description: Provides heavy physical protection and reduced physical torpor, but provides almost no protection from the elements.

name: Riot Boots
description: Provides heavy physical protection and reduced physical torpor, but provides almost no protection from the elements.

name: Riot Helmet
description: Provides heavy physical protection and reduced physical torpor, but provides almost no protection from the elements.

name: Electric Prod
description: Powerful stunning weapon, but can only be used for a single strike before recharge is needed.

name: Handcuffs
description: Equip this onto an unconscious player, to and they'll be restrained when they wake up!

name: Broth of Enlightenment
description: A single sip of this incredible broth will expand your mind and broaden your horizons, granting greatly increased experience gain for a brief time.
